doc.title: Desetiyat krag
doc.plot: For the hero of this grotesque, The Man, the nine circles of Hell are nothing more than a fun fair pavilion, a Sunday strolls in Disneyland, a trip on the roller coaster, and a ride on the Ferris wheel. There are nine circles in Hell but life is the Ten Circle. Sartre says, "Hell - these are the others!" And maybe, we are all Hell... Jokingly, of course.
